article_title: Donald Trump bashes opponents, Obama in front of 6,000 in Macon
article_text:
Trump says Clinton lacks stamina to be president

Also mocks Sanders for having hernia operation

Supporters say they like Trump’s blunt style

article_metadata.news-keywords: Trump, Macon, Georgia, Presidential, Campaign, GOP, Republican, Candidate, Speech
article_metadata.description: Donald Trump took aim at his opponents and policy concerns during his address to supporters at the Macon Coliseum on Monday night.
